min_length.label: Minimum length
min_length.description: Minimum length (or number of characters) constraint. UTF-8 characters are supported. If 0, empty or null, then it should be ignored (no minimal constraint).

max_length.label: Maximum length
max_length.description: Maximum length (or number of characters) constraint. UTF-8 characters are supported. If 0, empty or null, then it should be ignored (no maximal constraint).
